story.text: AMSTERDAM Jan 2 Dutch telecoms group KPN (KPN.AS)KPN.N said on Tuesday it will restructure its organisation to improve market share, turnover and profitability by serving clients based on a business and consumer approach. KPN's fixed line and mobile divisions will merge in new groups called business market and consumers market to focus on clients instead of technology and products, KPN said in a statement.
story.title: kpn reorganises divisions to focus on clients
